definition: suffix of a noun of locality
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: Take the plight of one community in China's far north-east.
sentences.chinese: 來看一下中國邊遠的東北地區一個社區的情況。

sentences.english: The remote county set up several middle-sized power stations in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 那個邊遠縣於1988年修建了幾座中型發電站。

sentences.english: There are 262 outlying islands and several are served by regularferries.
sentences.chinese: 在262個邊遠的小島之中有幾個是有渡輪服務的。

sentences.english: This had the effect however on turning areas such as Lijiang into small fiefdoms .
sentences.chinese: 在麗江這樣的邊遠小封地都是這樣。

sentences.english: Monkeypox occurs primarily in remote villages in Central and West Africa, near tropical rainforests.
sentences.chinese: 猴痘主要在中非和西非靠近熱帶雨林的邊遠村莊發生。

sentences.english: Why, they ask, does he live in such a strange out-of-the-way place?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼他住在那麼邊遠的地方？

sentences.english: Further enhance the countermeasure and powerful steps of outlying district's agricultural technology extension.
sentences.chinese: 進一步加強邊遠地區科技推廣的對策和有力措施。

sentences.english: You need various IVR scenarios to enable IVCM to respond remote callers interactively.
sentences.chinese: 你需要這套方案使各邊遠來電IVCM迴應互動。

sentences.english: However, there is still a need to increase coverage to remote areas and migrant workers.
sentences.chinese: 但是，仍有必要提高邊遠地區和流動人口的覆蓋率。

sentences.english: They hope to civilize all the natives in the distant area.
sentences.chinese: 他們希望使邊遠地區所有的老百姓都能接受文明。

sentences.english: Heavy vehicles are used to transport the coal to distant parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 用重型汽車把煤運往這個國家的邊遠地區。

sentences.english: People, a lot of them anyway, are tired of living out in the suburban boonies.
sentences.chinese: 人們，至少有許多人對居住在市郊邊遠地區感到厭倦。

sentences.english: Park in remote, but safe sections of parking lots.
sentences.chinese: 把車停放在停車場邊遠而又安全的地方。

sentences.english: In the outlying provinces that are part of Beijing's airshed, there is a great deal of heavy industry.
sentences.chinese: 在北京氣流區域的邊遠省份有很多重工業。

sentences.english: There are vast expanses of virgin land in the remote regions.
sentences.chinese: 在邊遠地區有大片大片未開墾的土地。

sentences.english: There are still many children who can not afford to go to school because of poverty in the remote areas of our country.
sentences.chinese: 在我國的邊遠地區仍有不少孩子因爲貧困而上不起學。
